title: Orphan trailer serif
content:
Any idea about the serif on the trailer for the film “Orphan” seen here? I attached a screencap as well.

[http://www.apple.com/trailers/wb/orphan](http://web.archive.org/web/20090327032005/http:/www.apple.com/trailers/wb/orphan)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Orphan.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090327032005/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_229.png) | 72.36 KB |

 [‹ WAR POSTER ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20090327032005/http:/www.typophile.com/node/56291 "Go to previous forum topic") [what typeface is this? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20090327032005/http:/www.typophile.com/node/56270 "Go to next forum topic")
author: filemeaway

comments.content:
Hi Andrew,

I think it is Garamond Premier Pro.  
F
Yeah, you’re right. Also I think it may be slightly tweaked, and/or stroked. Thanks!

You’re welcome.  
For the slight differences: Note that GPP comes in various [optical sizes](http://web.archive.org/web/20090327032005/http:/www.adobe.com/type/topics/opticalsize.html).
